law.catch_line: The board of directors of the converting association shall deliver to the Division Director:...

text.section:
The board of directors of the converting association shall deliver to the Division Director:
A certified copy of the minutes of the meeting at which the conversion was approved; and
The executed charter amendments and a conformed copy.

On receipt of the minutes and charter amendments under subsection (a) of this section, the Division Director shall:
Endorse the executed copy of the charter amendments as approved; and
Send to the converting association:
The endorsed copy; and
A final order of approval of the conversion to a capital stock association.
